title: The myrrour or glasse of Christes passion
author: Pinder, Ulrich, d. 1510 or 1519.
publicationDate: The yere of our lorde god M.CCCCC.xxx.iiii. 1534 The. xii. day of December]
publisher: In Flete strete, at the sygne of the George, by me Robert Redman,
notes: Translation of: Pinder, Ulrich.  Speculum passionis Domini nostri Jesu Christi.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reel 54 and at 1663 (same copy filmed twice).
